verses.name: Leviticus 19:9
verses.text: And when ye reap the harvest of your land, thou shalt not wholly reap the corners of thy field, neither shalt thou gather the gleanings of thy harvest.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:10
verses.text: And thou shalt not glean thy vineyard, neither shalt thou gather every grape of thy vineyard; thou shalt leave them for the poor and stranger: I am the Lord your God.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:11
verses.text: Ye shall not steal, neither deal falsely, neither lie one to another.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:12
verses.text: And ye shall not swear by my name falsely, neither shalt thou profane the name of thy God: I am the Lord.
